panels.title: mmap Override Applied
panels.description: Indicates the system SQLite had a non-zero DEFAULT_MMAP_SIZE and our fix overrode it to 0. A value > 0 confirms the fix is necessary on this system.

panels.title: Storage Health Timeline
panels.description: Green = healthy, Red = storage errors detected. Gaps indicate no data.
Tracks goroutine count over time to detect leaks. Alert thresholds: >500 absolute, sustained positive growth over 1h.
panels.title: Goroutine Count & Leak Detection
